channel.title: How do i make my own server client?
channel.description: Well, i'm making a server. Using Oceanx Source. I know how to edit client.java autospawn.cfg PLayerHander e.t.c.... But The client. The oceanX client, i have it right now. But the background on the Client Says Oceanx, and there's this guy dclaws specing. How can I change that? Like to change it to Legitpking or something. The wallpaper. Help please.

item.title: How do i make my own server client?
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

try topic server help and not tuts

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make my own server client?
item.dc:creator: @Devan_Ginn Devan Ginn
item.description:
@Devan_Ginn wrote:

i K0

If you go to the sprites folder there should be a file saved as title or background. Just open that file up in paint and edit it. XD
This is the easiest way to fix
!!!@@#@!!!

Read full topic
